Frank, at the end, i hear 'it was 'stephen'...where ;you hear, 'it was death'  
   
  sue
Sumption Frank <fsumption@...> wrote:
              
this is funny, and sad at the same time. The voice is even more complicated than it seems. 
  
   Frank
